title: "Cool Mapping Project"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(tmap)
hennepin_race <- get_decennial(
  geography = "tract",
  state = "MN",
  county = "Hennepin",
  variables = c(
    Hispanic = "P2_002N",
    White = "P2_005N",
    Black = "P2_006N",
    Native = "P2_007N",
    Asian = "P2_008N"
  ),
  summary_var = "P2_001N",
  year = 2020,
  geometry = TRUE
) |>
  mutate(percent = 100 * (value / summary_value))
```

```{r}
hennepin_dots <- hennepin_race %>%
  as_dot_density(
    value = "value",
    values_per_dot = 100,
    group = "variable"
  )
```

```{r}
background_tracts <- filter(hennepin_race, variable == "White")
tm_shape(background_tracts) + 
  tm_polygons(col = "white", 
              border.col = "grey") + 
  tm_shape(hennepin_dots) +
  tm_dots(col = "variable", 
          palette = "Set1",
          size = 0.005, 
          title = "1 dot = 100 people") + 
  tm_layout(legend.outside = TRUE,
            title = "Race/ethnicity,\n2020 US Census")
```
